sentences.sentence: When Kites gone, three Collared Crows, Magpie and Crested Myna occupied the tree.
sentences.translation: 黑鸢离去后，分别来了三只白颈鸦、喜鹊与八哥。

sentences.sentence: It is public knowledge that myna can imitate human words. But how a myna "speaks"?
sentences.translation: 八哥会学人说话，这是人人皆知的，但他怎样学人话？

sentences.sentence: Grittner on Space being covered was a group of Crested Myna dark, very spectacular sight.
sentences.translation: 格里·特纳上空被八哥群遮盖得一片黑暗，景象十分壮观。
